RecipeDef.label: hemogen medicine blood transfusion
RecipeDef.description: Use hemogen medicine to reduce the effects of blood loss. Due to using a prepared medical kit, it is faster than using a hemogen pack. Each hemogen medicine used recovers 35% blood loss. The operation will also restore hemogen to hemogenic individuals.
RecipeDef.jobString: performing blood transfusion with hemogen medicine on TargetA.
